overview: "Leather" is released in conjunction with the opening of Jimmy Joe Roche's solo exhibition CRIMCRAW at the Erin Cluley Gallery in Dallas, Texas. Inspired by Texas Chain Saw Massacre, Begotten, Dog Star Man, Phil Solomon's films, and Peter Kubelka's 1958 Schwechater Beer commercial, Roche's dark distortions provide the perfect nightmare fuel.
title: Leather
